alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN PINE, SOUTHEASTERN CARLTON AND NORTHWESTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 230 AM CDT... At 159 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Foxboro, or 18 miles southeast of Cloquet, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Superior, Hawthorne, Holyoke, South Range, Foxboro, Bennett, Pleasant Valley, Amnicon Lake, Chaffey, Amnicon Falls State Park, Harlis, Pattison State Park, Patzau, and Lyman Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
